extendedInfo.description: NES-FC is the high quality and fast NES&FC emulator. Play almost all your NES/FC games.This is the NES-FC Lite version with some features disabled. If you feel good, please buy the Full version to enjoy all the features!Features:+ Hardware keyboard support+ On-screen virtual gamepad with optional viberation feedback+ Support trackball+ Ten manual slots for save states with previews+ Game Genie support(Full version)!+ FDS support(Full version)!+ Multi-touch for 2.1++ Zapper/Light gun support, touch screen to fire, need to disable virtual gamepad!+ Fast Forward+ Screenshots+ Wiimote support+ Nes, fds, zip files support+ Turbo buttons***Button Design: Fede Stock (federico.stock@gmail.com)No titles are included in this app. ***Copy or download games to your SD Card and browse them within the app (default directory is /mnt/sdcard) and select to play.***To use fds, need to download BIOS file(The name is often ***.bin, e.g. [BIOS] Nintendo Famicom Disk System Japan).bin ) from Internet and transfer it to your SD card. Then select the file in the app. And then open fds rom to play. And use Eject/Insert option to change disk side.Note:When you need to change the disk side, please eject the used one and insert another.***To use Game Genie, need to download BIOS file(The name is often ***.nes, e.g. Game Genie (Unl).nes ) from Internet and transfer it to your SD card. Then select the file in the app and enable game genie. And then open rom file to play, you will see the game genie input screen. Note: you need to get the game genie code before input.***To use Keyboard: if you have a tablet with a keyboard (like the ASUS Transformer), going into the system settings and changing the input from 'ASUS Keyboard' to 'ANDROID Keyboard' pretty much fixes all problems with assigning keys. Please report any crashes/problems via email (include your device name and android version). I cannot answer the comments and will update the app ASAP.Hi guys,If you encounter a problem like "when I run and press A or B it wont let me use either button until I stop running". And if you make sure your phone can support multi-touch,please send me an email about your device name, type, android version and the game name.Thanks!

reviews.comment: Why can\'t I manually position the buttons?  Also make the d pad. And button size seperate the d pad will be good them the buttons are tiny. If this is fixed and its an easy fix ill give 5 stars and others will to
reviews.author: Alan Dombrowsky

reviews.title: Look elsewhere
reviews.comment: Pretty slow. Even on a galaxy s1. It loads up but as soon as you play a game it really gets slow.
reviews.author: Zane Vang

reviews.title: Terribly ugly
reviews.comment: It works but the interface is hideous. What\'s wrong with just a black background?
reviews.author: Jo\303\243o Lopes

reviews.title: Hard to see menu
reviews.comment: Menu buttons need to have a background, add more colors choices to the buttons, or let us apply a different wallpaper to the emulator, rather than use our system wallpaper. Mine is black, white and red. Makes it very difficult to see the menu buttons. Neither black or white settings help. Game play is fine though. Works great. Would like to donate if I knew it\'d get the menu buttons fixed.
reviews.author: Kyle Dozier

reviews.title: Awful menu,  outdated and ugly
reviews.comment: Skip it.  Google NESoid instead.  It\'s way better.
reviews.author: Ryan Brown

reviews.title: Misled by false claims in description, but the touch screen gun works
reviews.comment: Can\'t save state without paying to upgrade to pro, so it lost 4 stars for that. I can play duck hunt on it so I\'ll keep it just for that, and it got a bonus star for it. All other NES emulators for android that I have tried fail on duck hunt.
reviews.author: Jason Bigelow

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I\'m just an 11 year old castlevania fanboy And playing dracula\'s curse.Great and decent emulator.
reviews.author: John Lesiguez

reviews.title: Doesn\'t save, don\'t bother.
reviews.comment: Work amazingly, minus the fact you can\'t save your games. Wiimote works well with this application also.
reviews.author: Lucas Maliszewski

reviews.title: I love how
reviews.comment: Older phones work better than Samsung Galaxy Series! Cuz this works awesomly!
reviews.author: Jaiden Nazario

reviews.title: Needs a better direction pad and saves won\'t work.
reviews.comment: The direction pad is still awkward even resized.  aThe buttons need to be independently resizable.  My saved games are not available in legend of zelda after exiting the emulator.
reviews.author: Derik Wilson

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Plays my roms good but please add Moga support.
reviews.author: Norman Avery

reviews.title: Worst
reviews.comment: I was playing punch out and it froze plz fix
reviews.author: Nathaniel Johnson

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Free version works awesome with no intrusive ads. I can use a PS3 controller with an OTG cable without needing to root my Nexus 7. I\'m going to buy the full version so that I can use save states.
reviews.author: Dave Becker

reviews.comment: It plays nes. Button support is awful and it is copy protected so no app to sd
